name: TASK_ANC_EVT_INFO
description: This table contains filing information of the anchor event linked to the task.

columns.name: TASK_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the task record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: ANC_EVT_FILE_DATE
columns.description: The date in local time that this anchor event action occurs.

columns.name: ANC_EVT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The CSN of the encounter that is associated with this anchor event action.

columns.name: ANC_EVT_DATE
columns.description: The date in local time of the event that is associated with this anchor event action.

columns.name: ANC_EVT_FILE_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The instant in UTC time on which this anchor event action occurs.

columns.name: ANC_EVT_ACTION_C_NAME
columns.description: The anchor event action that occurrs.

columns.name: ANC_EVT_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The instant in UTC of the event that is associated with this anchor event action.

columns.name: ANC_EVT_LPP_ID
columns.description: The anchor event extension that was used for the anchoring or the unanchoring actions.
